refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A SubjectTerm is an individual subject word or phrase that describes the subject matter of a document or the portion of a document in which it occurs.
Subject terms are not expected to contain any markup. They are external descriptions from a controlled vocabulary.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Subject terms are rarely displayed to a reader. Usually, they are reserved for searching and retrieval purposes.
